Munging
=======

Munging operations to obtain tidy data.

```{r external_code, echo=FALSE}
read_chunk("01-A.R")
```

Converting character percentage values to numeric values
-----------------------------------------------------

Interest.Rate and Debt.To.Income.Ratio are imported as character values, but they are percentage values.
Both are formatted with a percent sign, e.g. "10%".
I substitute away the percent sign and convert the values to numeric.

```{r, eval=FALSE}
<<percentage_to_numeric>>
```

Converting character month values to integer values
-----------------------------------------------------

Convert Loan.Length to integer
```{r, eval=FALSE}
<<months_to_integer>>
```

Convert Loan.Purpose values to pascal case with point separator
```{r, eval=FALSE}
<<purpose_to_pc>>
```

Convert Home.Ownership values to pascal case
```{r, eval=FALSE}
<<ownership_to_pc>>
```
